sentences.en: From the deck of a ship, the island makes a startling apparition, like the Himalaya just emerged from the Flood.
sentences.cn: 坐船从甲板上看，这个岛屿简直是个惊人的神迹，就像喜马拉雅山在一片洪水中耸立。

sentences.en: He focuses on river basin biodiversity and local livelihoods throughout the Greater Himalaya.
sentences.cn: 他着重研究大喜马拉雅地区的流域生物多样性及当地人民的生存等问题.

sentences.en: Himalaya Tools is a suite of programs focusing on new techniques in data mining.
sentences.cn: 这些工具提供新的数据挖掘技术.

sentences.en: In the northwest, where human settlements are highly dependent on snowmelt in the Himalaya and Tianshan Mountains, temperature increase would mean disappearance of the oasis agriculture.
sentences.cn: 在西北地区，人们的生活极度依赖喜马拉雅山和天山的融雪，气温上升将意味着那里的绿洲农业将消失。

sentences.en: Like Mount Qomolangma, K 2 is in the Himalaya Mountains.
sentences.cn: 像珠穆朗玛峰一样, K2也属喜玛拉雅山脉.

sentences.en: This is the peak of the Himalaya Mountains . It is over 8,848 metres high.
sentences.cn: 这就是喜马拉雅山脉的顶峰,高8848米以上.

sentences.en: Two horseback riders stop for a smoke in Himalaya mountains.
sentences.cn: 喜玛拉雅山里,两位骑马者停下来抽烟休息.

sentences.en: Two men wrestle during a festival in Himachal Pradesh, which means “region of snowy mountains.” This resort area in the foothills of the Himalaya is an Indian favorite.
sentences.cn: 喜马偕尔-布拉代什（意为雪山地区）庆祝活动期间，两名男子在摔跤。这是印度人最喜爱的在喜马拉雅山脚下度假的地方。
欢迎加入喜玛拉雅展览!

trans.tran_cn: 喜马拉雅，高级斜纹呢，仿山东绸
